message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.DC 

This paper discusses the implementation of a centralized SDN architecture in a Low Power and Lossy Network (LLN) for Industrial IoT (IIoT) scenarios. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also discusses the allocation of resources and efficient communication, which falls under the category of cs.IT (Information Theory). The use of SDN for centralized control is a topic related to cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also discusses the challenges faced in implementing SDN in LLN, which falls under the category of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Finally, the paper proposes a mechanism for isolating SDN control traffic, which falls under the category of cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
